Help:Node.title: Death
Help:Node.Log:Description:
GAME MECHANICS: WOUNDS \& DEATH:death\
\Death in Allegory of Empires is permanent. You must explicitly consent to death, either during staff-run plots or when playing with your fellow players. Death will be handled on a case-by-case basis and you must contact staff if you are pursuing a PC plot that involves the death or your character.\
